alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:04PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Franklin, northwestern Webster, western Adams, Kearney, Buffalo and western Hall Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1003 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a gust front extending from near Hazard to 6 miles northeast of Riverdale to near Kearney to near Axtell to near Ragan. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Minden and Hildreth around 1010 PM CDT. Gibbon, Shelton, Upland, Heartwell and Norman around 1020 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kenesaw, Campbell, Roseland, Holstein, Prosser, Wood River, Bladen and Juniata. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 271 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Webster
